N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 604.7 - Stopping, standing or parking

State Regulations

No person shall stop, stand or park a vehicle upon any part
of the vehicular crossing except: (a) When necessary to avoid injury or damages to persons or property. (b) In compliance with the direction of a
bridge employee. (c) While paying
tolls. (d) When disabled. (e) In areas on the vehicular crossing
provided and marked by signs, striping or other devices marked for such
purposes. (f) At designated stopping
points prior to customs and immigration and inspection
booths. Notes
